attributes.title: This app killed my dog

My dog was sleeping in this room when out of nowhere light started flashing from the app. This light scared my dog so much, that he fell off the bed and onto scissors that then impaled him. I 100% blame this app and itâ€™s flashing lights that had no warning. I deleted this app before I ever even explored it and I suggest you all do the same. ğŸ˜”
